description: This schema represents the dispensing by a pharmacy of medication based on a prescription e.g., atenolol 50 mg, 20 tab.

___medication_dispensed.description: NDC code of the medication dispensed by the pharmacy, e.g., 10882-527-07, where 10882-527 indicates the medication and 07 the package size

___remaining_refills.description: The number of refills still available in the prescription.

references.description: Units are drawn in part from FDA units of presentation.
Units are drawn in part from FDA pharmaceutical dosage form.

___unit.description: The list of most commonly used units of measure for a medication dispensed. Suggestions for additions are accepted.
